Workflow.Name: Microsoft Teams Admin | Send Reminder Mail
Workflow.Description: Sends a daily email to people who have been asked for a business justification but who have not yet provided it, ensuring they know where and how to provide that justification and the ramifications of ignoring the request.

LocalizedName.description: Microsoft Teams Admin | Send Reminder Mail

Description.description: Sends a daily email to people who have been asked for a business justification but who have not yet provided it, ensuring they know where and how to provide that justification and the ramifications of ignoring the request.
